verses.verse: O LORD, rebuke me not in thine anger, neither chasten me in thy hot displeasure.
Have mercy upon me, O LORD; for I am weak; O LORD, heal me; for my bones are troubled.
My soul is also troubled exceedingly but thou, O LORD, how long?
Return, O LORD, and deliver my soul: save me for thy mercies' sake.
For in death there is no remembrance of thee; in Sheol who shall give thee thanks?
I am weary with my groaning; and every night I water my bed and wash my mattress with my tears.
Mine eye is weakened because of anger; and I am troubled by all my enemies.
Depart from me, all you workers of iniquity; for the LORD has heard the voice of my weeping.
The LORD has heard my supplication; the LORD has received my prayer.
Let all my enemies be ashamed and defeated; let them turn back and be destroyed suddenly.
